bibl.title: Official Notices Concerning Plunder of Rations.
bibl.note: Karanis, 3rd-2nd cent. B.C. The document consists of a "prosangelma" (ll. 1-11) and the beginning of another official notice (l. 12), and this gives the impression that the present document was copied from a "tomos synkollesimos".

bibl.title: Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III

bibl.seg: El Mosallamy Abdalla Hassan S., Official Notices Concerning Plunder of Rations (PCair. Mus. S.R. 2713).
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III (Napoli, 1984) pp. 815-823, 1 pl.

Karanis, 3rd-2nd cent. B.C. The document consists of a "prosangelma" (ll. 1-11) and the beginning of another official notice (l. 12), and this gives the impression that the present document was copied from a "tomos synkollesimos".
